articles.author: CHRISTINA LARSON AP science writer
articles.title: Giant sloths and mastodons coexisted with humans for millennia in Americas, new discoveries suggest - ABC News
articles.description: New discoveries from several archaeological sites in North and South America suggest that ancient people first arrived in the New World much earlier than scientists once thought
articles.content:
SAO PAULO, Brazil -- Sloths werent always slow-moving, furry tree-dwellers. Their prehistoric ancestors were huge up to 4 tons (3.6 metric tons) and when startled, they brandished immense claws.
For… [+7663 chars]

articles.author: TRAVIS LOLLER, LEAH WILLINGHAM, JENNIFER SINCO KELLEHER
articles.title: Farmers, business owners, fire survivors face uncertainty after $100B in disaster relief flounders - The Associated Press
articles.description: American farmers, small business owners and wildfire survivors are among those who will suffer if Congress cannot agree on a new spending bill after President-elect Donald Trump abruptly rejected a bipartisan plan that included more than $100 billion in disas…
